questions.question: What were the goals and objectives of this class? How did this course contribute to your educational experience?
What background (prerequisite classes, skills, or knowledge) did this course require?
What was effective and what was ineffective about the instructor's teaching techniques?
How well did the instructor take into account your learning needs and interests? To what extent did the instructor encourage you to ask questions and participate?
Which of the assigned readings did you find most useful? Which were not useful?
How many exams, papers, labs, presentations, projects, and other graded assignments did the course require you to complete? How could these be improved?
Roughly how many hours per week did you spend on this course outside of class? Did this level of effort match your initial expectations?
Finally, what would you suggest to fellow students thinking about enrolling in this class?
